title: Census Reporter 2020 Block Assignments for Washington, DC Neighborhood Clusters

columns.cr_geoid: An arbitrary unique identifier for a specific geography (e.g. neighborhood) included in a user uploaded map
columns.name: A name for a specific geography included in a user uploaded map, if available
columns.original_id: A unique identifier for a specific geography included in a user uploaded map, from the original source, if available
columns.pop100: The total population for the given block (Decennial Census 2020)
columns.hu100: The total housing units (occupied or vacant) for the given block (Decennial Census 2020)
columns.state_place_fips: The combined State/Place FIPS code for the given block (Decennial Census 2020)
